website_summaries.verdict: This umbrella works well in windy storms without inverting.
pros: Keeps you dry in a storm
Clear plastic allows you see out of the umbrella
Holds up well to rain and wind
Curves all the way over your head
cons: The umbrella arrives dusty and needs to be wiped down before use

website_summaries.verdict: This large umbrella can accommodate many, and the design is sleek and minimal.
pros: The 52-inch arc of this totes umbrella provides plenty of coverage for the average person
Its sturdy ribs won't flip over in the wind either, and the minimal design means it won't ever clash with your outfit
cons: The plastic may stick together when the umbrella's folded up

website_summaries.verdict: Some people might not like the bubble design; but if you do, this is the umbrella for you.
pros: Offers full protection for in wind and rain
Transparent and easy to see through
cons: Not as small or portable when closed as other umbrellas we tested, but if you need the bubble, design you won't mind

customer_reviews.title: These umbrellas were great! They do come dusty
customer_reviews.text: These umbrellas were great! They do come dusty, but simply wiping them off with a rag made them very clear! We used them on our wedding day, because it rained, and they made for very cute photos. It is also a very good quality umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R Pascarella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weddings!
customer_reviews.text: These umbrella's are amazing and made our wedding pictures! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Jones

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy to wipe off with a dry rag & it's ...
customer_reviews.text: All the other reviews about a white dust on the plastic are true, but it was easy to wipe off with a dry rag & it's well made. I didn't realize when I bought it that it has a lifetime warranty, so that's definitely worth the price you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Solointrepid

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: First impression...nice a big umbrella, handle is long, kinda bulky, clear view, fantastic. It feels sturdy and protective. I have yet to use it. I live in Southern California...waiting for rain. Update: I used this today in gusty winds and rain. El Niño arrived to So Cal yesterday! We haven't seen this much rain in years! I can say that this really held up well. The bubble shade creates a shield around me. I really like this concept. The only problem this makes me feel like a horrible person because I cannot offer to shield anyone else from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Love this umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great! Sturdy and just the right size for me and my 6 month old. It provides great coverage while allowing my 6 month old and I a view. While using it I can honestly say we did not get wet. Great purchase and worth the cost. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia1c

customer_reviews.title: it looks good and I get tons of compliments when I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is everything that it said it would be. I know there are a lot of umbrellas that say their bubble umbrellas and THEY ARE NOT. They are slightly rounded and this is not the case with this, it is a true Bubble umbrella, it looks good and I get tons of compliments when I use it in the rain. It's easy to open and close, it's actually pretty big which is great. It arrived beyond quickly and packaged perfectly. I intend on getting a lot more of these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: ms james

customer_reviews.title: she liked it, I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 for my wife a few months ago, she liked it, I liked it, so I ordered 2 more. When I am going to use mine (2 months after purchase) for the first time I noticed that the umbrella is damaged. The plastic caps housing the metallic arm is very flimsy, 2 of them are broken (see pic). DO NOT BUY, get a sturdier one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Manolo

customer_reviews.title: Good Rain protection
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella. I live in Chicago, USA and it rains here sometimes. I don't usually like being too damp when I get to a destination so an umbrella can help prevent this situation. I have noticed that this umbrella has more of a curve than other umbrellas so it covers my head more. It is also clear plastic. This is important because the big curve comes below eye level. An opaque umbrella of this design would significantly impair vision in front and above the user. Smart design feature!
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Helps with social distancing! Seriously, that's why I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: People are really bad at staying 6 feet away from others in my NYC neighborhood. The worst is when I'll be going for a walk for exercise (with a mask) and stepping closer to the parked cars to get away from a fellow pedestrian, and then I'll suddenly be within inches of someone sitting in their car with the window down! With no. Mask. On. And in general, too many people couldn't care less. To use for social distancing: I put the rod/handle over a shoulder or under an armpit, letting the canopy rest on my chest, and then my whole front is protected. Bubble umbrellas: helping you double social distance when others aren't trying at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Intended

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has a manual open and close mechanism which is covered by a flexible piece of material to keep your fingers from getting pinched when you operate it. The interior of the open umbrella is only big enough for one person, but it is clear and well spaced enough to hold down over most of my upper body during a downpour or wind gust. No problems with using the umbrella, or navigating while using it. Stores easily, and has a strap with a snap to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: U Dont Know Me

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that there is a Film/powdery substance inside and outside of this TOTES SIGNATURE umbrella ...and unfortunately for me... I cannot return it because I missed the return window by 4 days. I purchased a second one and it was perfect... a cheaper one... same TOTES brand....ULTRA CLEAR ... I don’t understand why this more expensive version was delivered in this condition and I really wish I could return it. A major downpour is expected tomorrow ... I should have checked it when I received it during summer-like weather .
customer_reviews.author: GTShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see where you are going, safer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. It fits over your head and down to your shoulders. It keeps you much drier. The major plus is that you can see where you are going even with ran driving straight at you. I think it is much safer sight-wise, and also it doesn't invert in strong winds like the usual umbrellas do. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: concerned consumer

customer_reviews.title: You have ONE JOB, umbrella :/
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it leaked. I guess it was better than *no* umbrella, but come on! You have ONE JOB, umbrella!! I missed the return window, so I'll hit up Totes to see how they treat me. Cross your fingers for me. I'll update this review after I contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshirepuss

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, won’t work for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and creates a dome around you while walking in the rain. However, one thing to note and why it’s not 5 stars is this umbrella is still huge when closed so is not an option for travel.
customer_reviews.author: ReeViews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not oversized
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down a beautiful looking umbrella BUT the size is severely underwhelming. If you are a child or someone very thin this umbrella may be larger than a normal umbrella but it does not live up to “oversized” by any means. I’ve used this umbrella a dozen times and each time I end up with either my purse, back, front, or arms (usually a combination of them) wet because no matter how this umbrella is held there simply isnt enough coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lynn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Immediately returning... so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was SUPER excited to receive this umbrella and was immediately disappointed when I opened it up. This umbrella has such a cute shape but it was completely covered in smudges/scuffs. Initially I thought it was just from the packaging, but I tried to wipe it off to no avail. It wasn’t just one or two spots. It was completely covered in blemishes so it’ll have to be sent back :( I’m not sure if I’ll repurchase and hope for a better one or go with a different brand altogether. Totes is usually a fantastic brand so I’m confused and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KayEss

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: I simply bought this umbrella on amazon because a plain clear umbrella it wasn't available from other (most others had some sort of pattern). I've giving this a 3 star review for a couple reasons. The first being mediocre quality, two of the metal rods holding together the clear plastic were flimsy and made it easy for the plastic part of the umbrella to come loose. The second involves the powder like substance on the plastic itself. Unfortunately unlike others, i was not able to clean the powder off mine as it was adhering to the plastic too strongly. It made the clear plastic more of a cloudy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mutt_1990

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD WITH BACKPACK
customer_reviews.text: If you’re gonna use this with a backpack... don’t buy it. I tried using it at college and it was a disaster. The way it bubbles causes the droplets to fall all over your backpack, it’s like a waterfall landing there. AND your backpack won’t be covered by it because it doesn’t fit. You have to try to cram yourself in the front and hold it super awkward. IF you are using it to walk around with like a purse or nothing, it’s probably fine. The talcolm inside is annoying at first, but they need it so the plastic doesn’t stick at first. Just wipe it down a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella! Love it, works smoothly, easy to see through. The plastic is sturdy enough to hold up. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Van

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several years ago and it is holding up well. I like the shape of this umbrella. It doesn't catch the wind and it stays close around your shoulders so less rain blows in. The design also prevents accidentally poking other people with it as the curves over the shoulders and it closer to the body. Highly recommend this for kids for just this reason! Ideal for city walking or outdoor farmer's market or something where you want to stay dry and not put someone's eye out in the process. It did come with a light dusting of powder to prevent the plastic from sticking together. I just let the rain take care of that for me. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Stunning but not as thick As I had hoped. Still beautiful though!
customer_reviews.text: I cant not wait to try this out. I do have to say it's beautiful, but it also seems sort of thin. (I thought the plastic would be thicker but it isn't a deal breaker for how beautiful it is.) Now I just have to test it out in the wind and rain.--will be updating review. *the 1st pic is with flash off. 2nd with flash on. *the 3rd and 4th are in natural lighting, no flash.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this umbrella!! Everyone should own one!! It is ideal in the city; I can keep my head (and my hair style) covered and protected from wind, rain, snow, etc. The clear color is AMAZING so I can be deep under the umbrella and still see where I am going! Plus the bubble feature makes it easier to dart between people, I'm not taking up as much space as typical umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mintz

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. Powder inside and outside gets all over and makes it difficult to clean. Hard to KEEP OPEN...The button doesn't catch easily. Very often I have to hold it open from the inside; terrible. Bulky. Not easy or fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry about the dust!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this umbrella to use as a prop if it rains during our engagement shoot, and I couldn't be happier with it. Other reviewers were right - there is a slight dusty film on both the inside and the outside of the umbrella when it arrives - but as long as you're expecting it, it really doesn't detract from the quality of the product at all. I just opened the umbrella (outside, because superstition) and wiped it down with a damp paper towel, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Third time's the charm!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella, came well packaged and still had the tags on it so I Kno it's new, I had found this umbrella at Sears a long time ago but it got stolen at a Kevin Hart concert I got lucky enough to find it again at Sears it was the last one and I don't know how but I just recently lost it again this time I don't know what happened! LOL so this is the third time I had this umbrella and I'm trying my darndest to never lose it again cuz I love it so much it got great coverage and it's just so stylish and I get so many compliments on this umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: It's Huge!
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the measurements. I had wanted a sturdy umbrella to take to a very rainy locale. However, there was no way I could fit it into any piece of luggage. I loved the idea of it, but I ultimately returned it because I normally live in Los Angeles (we're car people here) and don't spend a lot of time walking in the rain as I do in other countries. I would have kept it if I didn't travel so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Lawrence

customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering it just because some other people said it wasn’t very see-through but some people just said it was a powder. But when I opened mine there was barely any powder, i still just gave it a quick wipe down with a paper towel and it was perfect. It’s see-through and feels very durable and it covers more of you than other umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly much heavier than I anticipated. The area that is shielded from water is not very wide. The plastic began to stick together frequently after closing, and eventually after under a year the umbrella completely broke when I opened it. It's very cute but not very practical if you walk in the rain often.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: This would still be a terrific umbrella as it was years ago.., however unlike years ago the first time I used it was today and the plastic covering the metal at the bottom of one of the wires already broke off! Obviously poorly made
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Very modern and stylish! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was exactly what I was looking for! It's great for allowing me to look where I'm walking, and it also prevents the wind/rain from getting under the umbrella and ruining my bangs/makeup! It also looks very sleek and stylish. It does come with a light dusting of powder to keep it from sticking together, but I wiped that off with a damp cloth and it looks great! My first umbrella did come badly bent, but I was sent a replacement very quickly! Now I find myself wishing for it to rain! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LannieM

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my wedding, it rained but they kept our hair and makeup covered. They do have a powder coating kind of to keep it front sticking together, but you can’t tell in pictures. I even decided to add vinyl decals to the umbrellas and give them as gifts. The photo shown has one panel cleaned with windex. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Doesn’t reverse in wind. Ability to see through it while walking. Protects hair from rain and from becoming wind blown. Protects my shoulders from rain. Long, sharp point would be good for self-defense if needed. Sturdy handle. Con: No automatic opener which takes more time to open. It’s necessarily long, so it’s not as easy to “Put down” and get it into the car than short umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Made for tiny humans.
customer_reviews.text: Having very, very curly hair, I thought I'd try out this style of umbrella and maybe avoid becoming Miss Frizzle every time it rains (which for the last several months has been more often than not!). The umbrella works fine, and I'm sure it's a lovely choice for children and other tiny humans. For those of average size, however, it's just a bad idea. Because the umbrella comes down closer to your body, so does the water. Your choices are: walk around with your elbows tucked in tight, or have wet arms. There's a reason most umbrellas fan out wide. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was  2 person umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella, and I like that you can hold it over your head and see through it, to really keep yourself dry. However, I thought it was a 2 person umbrella, it could be two very small people, or a parent and baby; Otherwise there is no way two people fit under here unless they are Siamese twins.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: These Are Super Cute- Sturdy and Large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my daughters and when they arrived, I loved them so I purchased a third for myself! This style is well crafted, large coverage and appears that. it will withstand a heavier than normal (in my state) wind/rainy day. For my age it is reminiscent of what I carried in elementary school while wearing my clear goulashes so it makes for a fun nostalgia. After purchasing I did see this in a wholesale shoe store chain (still well within the spring/rain season) and it was the same price as I paid here; for some reason that kind of surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Wakanda_Forever

customer_reviews.title: Extremely not happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, shows as pictures, after one time use, it was broken, if someone uses umbrella don’t buy it, go for another real umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars because the main pole was bent in the middle. The shipping box wasn't bent and it was pretty well packed.... So I don't know what happened. Fortunately it still opens, I'm hoping it's ok. I'd rather not go through the hassle of returning since it still works. But because it's bent already, it screams not as strong as I'd like. Also, in the Amazon picture shows a thick band at the end of the umbrella...it's not that thick. All in all. Pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: cksefton987

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping dry
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has a lot of pluses, but a few things I don't like. It does keep you dry, but I was surprised at how much wind still blows from under the bottom. It is a bit heavy and awkward to carry. I am use to a small Tote's umbrella that I can almost put in my lunch tote. So this is almost like carrying a cane. It definitely keeps me drier than my small umbrella - and I don't think the wind will invert it the way smaller umbrellas do. I think I just need to get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fancy: This umbrella can pair with any outfit and doesn't dampen style even on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is fantastic! The handle is a clear acrylic handle with a matte silver painted gradient color closer to the opening button of the umbrella. It came coated with a plastic protecting powder to keep the umbrella from sticking (and maybe melting) to itself... which washed off in the first rainstorm. Functionality: This is one of the best umbrellas I have ever used hands down. The bubble shaping prevented wind from blowing under the coverage area and kept me completely dry (from my knees up) in a very wet windy rainstorm. With another umbrella i would have been soaked shoulders down. It's Sturdy but also very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Tech

customer_reviews.title: bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a bubble umbrella, so after my last super cheap one died when the wind snapped it open, I decided to go ahead with this one. Mine did not have the white, powder residue some others have mentioned. I feel pretty certain that it will be much harder for the wind to catch this umbrella because of it's shape. It seems sturdy enough, but I haven't had the chance to test it so I will update the star rating later.
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Product - Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrellas for $26 in March. I thought that the Totes brand would ensure that I was getting something decent. I have used it 4 times and the mechanism on the handle that makes it open and close is already broken - it is closed and absolutely will not open. I feel that it should be replaced. Cheaply made product. Certainly not worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: The best umbrella I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella in hopes that it wouldn't flip inside out when it was windy, and it did that and more. We had a pretty bad storm tonight and the wind was incredibly strong, so strong I really did think it was going to break - it not only did not break but it protected me from the hail and the extreme gusts of cold wind from hurting my face. Because it is see-through you can carry it pretty low and look through the umbrella when walking. The wind didn't break the umbrella and it didn't hurt my face. Overall I am so happy I purchased this umbrella and plan on purchasing more for my family.
customer_reviews.author: pb1124

customer_reviews.title: Super cute clear bubble umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cute (love the birds on the wire) and esp the clear plastic which allows you to see where you’re going while providing you the maximum protection for your head and shoulders from the rain.. I gave it 3 stars because the plastic material sticks together when it’s wrapped up, and if you’re stuck in the rain and want to quickly open your umbrella it will take two hands to help it open. Also, mine arrived damaged and had to return it. Luckily I found the exact same umbrella at Marshals for less than half the price!
customer_reviews.author: iGemini

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a clear umbrella for a while now, I had very specific requirements and this met all of them. Only down side is the handle, doesn't look as nice as the pictures. The umbrella is very sturdy and lightweight. High quality materials. The clear portion did come a bit musty as other reviewers mentioned but for me it didn't matter much. I was more concerned with the size and depth of the umbrella. I was looking for a 70's inspired look and this is just that.
customer_reviews.author: BadHobbit

customer_reviews.title: Great for rain or hitting people
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with that weird dusty powder that other reviewers mentioned, but after 1-2 uses that disappeared. It keeps me dry and handles the Michigan winds/rain quite well despite its appearance. It's hard to hold on to but I appreciate that I can walk to class without destroying my makeup/hair/outfit...and my expensive laptop/backpack. I like that it offers full coverage but also allows you to actually see where you're going. It is good for the price, I would recommend it for people who need to walk less than a mile but probably not for heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: The powder in which the umbrella is covered won't come off
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this umbrella once, then it got stolen, then I ordered this same one. Both were covered in powder (I guess, to prevent sticking). First time, it washed off quite well with regular water. BUT!!! the second time nothing helped. I've tried everything; the ugly powder lines still are everywhere. 🙂🔫 The worst thing is that, the more you try to remove them, the more you stretch the gentle material. Which makes the umbrella look terrible. I'm very upset about this; it was a total waste of money, let alone the fact that you particularly look forward to receive your order when the rainy season has started.
customer_reviews.author: lemmedie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, stylish and still does the job intended!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! Very cute design as well as functionality! I love that there is a simple design without impeding on the functionality of needing to see through while walking. Some people have mentioned the white film or such on it. Mine did not have that however I could see that being a useful thing to keep it from sticking together! I’m going to get some more as gifts for the ladies since they all have complimented mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Not kid sized.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't kid-sized. Just an FYI for anyone who is buying it as a gift for a younger kid... And yes, it comes covered in a light powder so it's not all stuck together. Not like someone dumped flour all over it, just a light layer. Just don't think you're going to unpack a crystal clear umbrella or anything. Besides the not-kid-sized thing, it seems like it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: abcreader

customer_reviews.title: Heavy yet strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s a bubble umbrella!! And since it’s clear I took permanent marker and personalized it!! Would show pictures but not yet done. I will add photos soon! It’s to heavy for my daughter to carry. But we both fit under it just fine. It’s not collapsible. So if your looking for a travel umbrella? This isn’t a good choice. Very well made though! And holds up to wind! Lovey looking as well!
customer_reviews.author: staci

customer_reviews.title: Came very dusty inside, but does a goof job
customer_reviews.text: This style of umbrella rocks. I wasn't a huge fan of the silver handle and canopy pinstripe. But it keeps me dry, hasn't broken after months of use, and feels very sturdy. Measure before buying. It's longer than other similar umbrellas I've owned. Also sturdier. Also buyer beware - don't use this umbrella when it's brand new and you're wearing black. Otherwise, you'll be donning dust all over your hands and black clothes. Dust goes away after 5+ months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is very attractive and exactly what I was looking to purchase. It is a large umbrella, so not terribly light weight or easily transportable, however it provides good coverage from the elements. I ordered two, one for me and one for my daughter for Christmas. Unfortunately, when she opened the Amazon box on Christmas Eve, we discovered that one of the umbrellas was broken. When I went to see about returning the item and replacing it, I discovered that the window to return the item had passed. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Janke

customer_reviews.title: Looks like something you could buy from the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is not completely clear. Has a chinsy looking handle that is "ombré silver" and thin gray plastic edging. Looks like something you could buy from the dollar store. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: amandanicks

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I have had this umbrella as you can see for quite a while. I love it! You can completely cover your head and see where you are walking too. Nothing blocks your vision. I get more complements on it. It has stood the test of time and the umbrella still works perfectly and it is still as clear as the day I bought it. I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Unbaked Pegga

customer_reviews.title: Rain suddenly stopped after I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: We were supposed to be having bad weather for a while, but apparently buying a decent umbrella tempted fate! The two times I've managed to use it so far, though, it worked great! So much for the rainy summer we were having. I can see why some people might complain about "dust" on it, but it really washed off fine after a rainstorm, and you can see through it just fine. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan A Van Zandt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, practical and attractive
customer_reviews.text: As usual, TOTES gets it right. Most people don't shop for umbrellas -- you usually buy one on the fly if you leave yours home or get caught in a sudden downpour. But the ones you buy on the street or in the drugstore are usually pretty flimsy and don't hold up to the wind or steady rain. Used this umbrella for the first time last week during a rain/snow event and it was perfect. Kept me dry and covered.
customer_reviews.author: LeeinNY

customer_reviews.title: I liked it enough that I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: First, I read some complaints about white powder on the umbrella that upset other buyers. I think the powder prevents the folds of the umbrella from sticking together, which I found to be an issue later on. Once you've used this umbrella and stored it, it's not always hassle-free to expand it again! You kind of have to unstick the layers. That is my only complaint. It's love how tall the umbrella is and I receive compliments on it every time I put it to use. When I lost the first one I bought this weekend, I promptly ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeané

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few months and it's kept me dry and held up in strong winds
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Windy City
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella because it gets so windy in NY. Every other umbrella I have used has blown open or broken because of the force. Because of the dome shape and sturdiness, this umbrella has been perfect in bad weather. I have used it in rain, snow, and on super windy days. It is still in perfect condition, and I like that it has a curved handle so I am able to hook it on my arm or my bag while I am walking and can still use my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wedding Photos
customer_reviews.text: So it poured on our wedding day... thanks Hurricane Matthew. But these were so lovely and arrived just in time (I ordered them 3 days before we left to go to the Lake... our wedding was kind of a destination wedding so its scary having to order things on short notice). The photos we took outside were absolutely gorgeous and super cute with these umbrellas... and now we have a keepsake to use and remember our wedding every time it rains
customer_reviews.author: Diana Flynn Ruane

customer_reviews.title: Not a Folding Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as Christmas gift for a city resident. Not only does it provide the safety and courtesy of "watching where you're going", it enables him to enjoy his walks around his historic home town.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It is very good quality and doesn’t look like it will tare easily at all. I shoved it in the back of my SUV with metal signs and completely forgot that the signs were back there and didn’t rip through the plastic at all, that’s durable. I’m still an idiot so I need quality things for when I do silly things like my action today! What a relief! HAHA
customer_reviews.author: Jolex

customer_reviews.title: Covers more, very strong, and I can SEE!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to Missouri from Nevada, and I really needed an umbrella. I 've tried others but they usually end up breaking from some strong wind, or the metal bends. I have had them turn completely inside out, during a strong wind and rainstorm one time. I used to use umbrellas to keep the sun off of me, but now I need it for the rain. This keeps me really dry, as it covers more, and I can see through it. I live in a somewhat rural area where there are sometimes no sidewalks, and this is much safer. Love it, and really really fast shipping! A great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic, practical and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: So nostalgic. Love this umbrella, now I can actually see where I'm going without bumping into people. another benefit is that I'm completely sheltered from the rain, my head anyway, so my makeup and hair remains perfect by the time I get to work. Some reviews already mentioned there is some white chalky substance inside of the umbrella. I believe this is to help the plastic not stick together; after I got my umbrella I washed it out and the inside of the umbrella was somewhat more glued together than before, but it is still relatively easy to open the umbrella even without the chalky substance, it simply helped not have it glued together as much than without.
customer_reviews.author: SuliDoll

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella, but not good if you have a large tote or backpack. I purchased this to use at work, but the design caused the water to go right into my tote. Plus, it can be a little tricky to open at times. If I had a cross body purse, then it would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Careful! Umbrella came bent
customer_reviews.text: Ummm.. my umbrella came completely bent? I noticed some people’s didnt so I guess it’s a matter of luck. The boxes it came in was pretty spacious so it’s weird how it got bend like this. Will ask for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Borboa

customer_reviews.title: The best umbrella I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I really love this umbrella! Before this I was constantly needing new umbrellas because sideways winds are a mess, and umbrellas are always flipping inside out. This one will not flip or break in the wind (or, maybe it will break eventually, but it has not broken under conditions in which other umbrellas have broken). I highly recommend it. It's true that it has some powder on it, but, like other people have stated, I think that is to help the thing not stick together. So no, it's not going to look like a magical pristine bubble when you walk around with it, but I think it's 100% worth it. Keeps you and your stuff dry!
customer_reviews.author: GryffindorGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great product -- More computers should purchase. Why? Simple - (1) less likely to get caught in bad wind and turn upside down because the umbrella coverage is around your body; and (2) while others cannot see you because they are trying to block wind/rain as they walk -- you will see everything because of the clear plastic. I bought two in this order -- one for me and one for a friend. If you commute in a large city and park one place to walk to work -- You must have this umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Stephens

customer_reviews.title: It's cute, but don't waist your money:(
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this umbrella. The shape and size do a really good job of keeping my hair from getting wet. Unfortunately, I bought this umbrella in June of 2019 and have only used it about 5 times. After the 2nd usage, the plastic piece that covers the lever that opens and closes the umbrella cracked. Now I have a difficult time getting the umbrella to open. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom was thrilled that she could see straight/clear thru the umbrella in the rain at all tiimes.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST umbrella ever made. Bought one for my little 91 year-young mother. She was thrilled with it (although was hesitant about it before taking it outside in rain.) Once she got out there with it....it was a great big "WOW!" to her. Looks like we can teach a dear old pooch a new trick! Gotchya Mum!! Many Thanks to Totes!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hartman

customer_reviews.title: but that also means it doesn't cover a large enough area to be useful. I ended up walking with this huge thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything but my head was instantly wet, and it was not in crazy wind. It may not budge to wind cause it's curved, but that also means it doesn't cover a large enough area to be useful. I ended up walking with this huge thing dragging closed in one hand and a small old umbrella over my head. It was nice to see through the umbrella for a sec, but I'd rather be dry.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Large size umbrella that doesn’t collapse - so ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Large size umbrella that doesn’t collapse - so won’t fit in your purse but this will keep your whole top half completely dry and clear so you can walk and see like normal! I live in Florida where it rains all the time so this is perfect. And good for the occasional cute photos. I’ll come back and update on durability after I’ve used it a bunch of times but so far so good 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't rain very often here in sunny California
customer_reviews.text: but this past year (2019) has seen so much more rain than we're used to, and I definitely needed a new umbrella. This umbrella is perfect, and its shape prevents it from being blown inside out. Plus, being in this protective bubble umbrella keeps me and my purse dry. I can see clearly through the plastic. It's not so wide that I don't have to tilt it to go through a doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Poulette

customer_reviews.title: Really, totes?
customer_reviews.text: As one can see from the pictures, my totes umbrella came bent and I am extremely dissappointed in Totes. I bought this item as a Valentine's day gift for my girlfriend. Although it did not ruin our evening, it did leave a bad taste in our mouths. I am looking to return it and as of now, my rating will be one star. Absolutely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: listening

customer_reviews.title: Excellent excellent excellent
customer_reviews.text: I work for a major Hospital I have to walk to the tunnel where the ambulance Bay is and when the wind blows through their oh my gosh it's like a small hurricane it has torn up so many of my umbrellas but this one no way I really like this umbrella a very sturdy does not turned inside out
customer_reviews.author: KIM BASS

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was excellent, all packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: The mechanical part of pushing the umbrella up in position is not a smooth movement with ease. Took me 15 try's before I was able to lock it in position.The umbrella came with a powder residue on the plastic portion of umbrella. I'm assuming this will wash away with rain. The umbrella is over priced for not being able to lock into position. All the umbrellas I have had none of them had a powder residue on clear see thru plastic. The positive about umbrella it is large enough for two and it has the brella long enough to cover and protect your shoulders when walking and see thru it to walk forward.The shipping was excellent,all packaged very well...........
customer_reviews.author: Optifastgirl

customer_reviews.title: Coverage from the rain
customer_reviews.text: Though this umbrella is great for one person, or isn't not for 2 people just by design. I bought it for myself, but in the event that I want to shield someone else from the rain, it is very difficult to do. The shoe of the umbrella falls so that it is meant for only 1 person. With that being said it serves great. However, if you're planning to share this umbrella or use ot for you and your baby in a stroller, it's not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Vaya

customer_reviews.title: Large and bulky, no easy way to store
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this umbrella, I realized it would be large but I thought I was willing to compromise that because I knew I wanted a clear one. However, when I received it, it was just far too large for the space in which I live. It does not fold up and is extremely long and bulky, meaning you would have to carry it around wherever you take it as it will not fit into a purse or backpack. It is just so large that I felt obnoxious walking down the street using it. I like that it is clear, but just compromise on its difficulty to be stored conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good umbrella, would prefer to be a bit wider
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella works well and keeps most rain out. However due to the structure it doesn't really work well for if it is raining and windy as the wind will still cause the rain to hit anything below my shoulders. The structure does prevent the wind from flipping the umbrella over which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: An on-campus must.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has held up to the wind tunnel that is Kent State University. I have literally watched other students with cheap umbrellas get soaked and have their umbrellas turned inside out. I cannot exaggerate how windy of a campus this is. I keep this in my car at all times. Added bonus for looking classy and timeless. Yes, there will be some powdery residue upon opening of the product initially. Go outside and give it a rinse!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Great for one, maybe not a large bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this umbrella for a while now, and I absolutely love it! So cute, and pretty sturdy. It’s a short rainy season, so it is only used for a month or two at a time. The only caveat is that this umbrella is only large enough to cover one person, and not a large backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I reaaaaally liked this umbrella in the beginning. I live in Boston so most umbrellas don't fare well against the wind and rain. This was the first umbrella that didn't turn inside out when I first used it. However, the plastic ends are very cheaply, flimsily attached to the metal parts. I bought one last year and it broke after about a month of use. I bought another one this year in the spring and it broke after a couple weeks of use. It's not a reliable umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sora C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift and good for you, too
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. Will work well in rainy season. It is the time of a pandemic now and we thought our face masks would get wet in rainy season. These will do the trick in keeping them dry. Well-made umbrellas. Would buy again and I gifted one and the person loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mixher

customer_reviews.title: This time I'm not so fortunate. -Plastic ends would come out of place with ...
customer_reviews.text: Here are the issues with the umbrella after a few uses. The first time I bought two and they both lasted a number of years so I bought a replacement. This time I'm not so fortunate. -Plastic ends would come out of place with each use, sometimes repeatedly. -Curved wire also pops out of place, have to put back in place before using each time. -Bottom of the center pole separates from the rest of the umbrella (end result: you'll end up with the handle in one hand and the umbrella falling to the ground
customer_reviews.author: Real & True

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty? It lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute umbrella and I liked it while it lasted. However if you market your product as having a lifetime warranty and the strut breaks within a year of purchase, why should I bother spending the money on one of these umbrellas again? I'm better off with the dollar cheap ones because I won't care when it breaks inside of a month. I don't think this umbrella is a good investment, nor totes brand in general after this.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Most fun umbrella design ever invented!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much, just bought another one for my daughter. We can’t wait for rain! Both work at home and if rain comes down, itz break time! She holds our toddler nice and dry under the long hood and we can see where we’re going! Itz sturdy and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I saw that other buyers complained about the powder that’s on the plastic so it won’t stick but I didn’t find it a problem at all. In fact, I left it on there. I’ve had these type umbrellas before and if you leave it in a hot car in the summer, you’ll wish you hadn’t taken it off. It does stick together then. This is nicer than other ones I’ve owned. Covers my head and shoulders perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda708

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is cute to look at. It is safe in the fact that you can easily see where you are going as you walk. However, it is difficult to open and is frustrating if it suddenly starts raining and you cannot make it function. I was disappointed but will keep and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't LOVE a Bubble Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Being a child growing up in the 70's a bubble umbrella was a big deal! Well now this 50 something has her own bubble umbrella. The birds on the wire are ADORABLE!! I simply love this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Seem quality except the snap broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: Snap broke the first time I opened the umbrella and there are some scratches on the handle probably because the umbrella was packaged in a much larger box with only one strip on crumpled paper for protection. My kiddo doesn't mind it so I'm going to keep it, but I wouldn't buy it again. Seems like very good quality, thick durable plastic. Feels sturdy. Not as doomed as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute umbrella but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is adorable. I have used it three times and every time I get a ton of compliments. I am 5'6 and it's super comfortable, the perfect size for an adult. My only complaint is that this umbrella is NOT sturdy. The metal structure is always coming apart and I have to fit it back in to the appropriate holes. This is only after using it three times. In addition, when I went to use it today I could hardly get it open as there seems to be some problem with the button you press to open it. I expected to be able to use it more than 3 times before it starts to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Umbrella, Even the Handle is Clear!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a MUST-HAVE for photographers! You never know when it will start to rain during or just before a photo session. This is a great tool for weddings especially. I love that there is minimal material to get in the way of it being see-through. The umbrella is very rounded and even the handle is clear! One warning: I wouldn't suggest using this right out of the box. Mine had a significant amount of powder residue on the outside and inside, so I had to wipe mine down for about 10 mins with a wet cloth. There are still parts that aren't all-the-way clear, but I could try to clean it out more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and great product.
customer_reviews.text: The compact foldup umbrellas are great and so convenient UNTIL you are really in a rain downpour. You need this umbrella~ it covers your head and shoulders protecting you from snow, sleet, rain and wind!
customer_reviews.author: DTSN

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this type of umbrella for a long time and finally ordered it. I am very pleased with it. It seems to be well made. I have used it only, once but I loved it-it is exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Blaine

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as expected. Im happy with this purchase and would recommend it to a friend. It dose have a white powdery substance in the inside and outside that's the consistency of baby powder. I assume it's to preserve the plastic until purchased. Easily cleaned off though. I havn't used it yet but seems strong for windy days and is large enough to cover the trunk up of an average sized adult male.
customer_reviews.author: RichieRich

customer_reviews.title: White film coating umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. It was covered in a white film that I could not get off. I had the umbrella monogramed and the designer said she had to scrub it to remove the film in that section. I triwd my best to get ir off the other areas, but was unsuccessful. This was a GIFT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a photoshoot and was disapointed to find that the inside was covered in a dust coating that i assume prevents the plastic from sticking to its self. I tried to get the dust off with a dry rag, a wet rag and then i just put it in the shower hoping that rinsing it off would work. No luck. Wouldn't reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful looking umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Update: lasted me about 2.5 years, one of the arms broke but still opened and functioned. however I eventually got tired and just threw it out. Don't think I'll repurchase/go through the hassle of the warranty. Works so far, the plastic isn't as taught as I thought it would be but it's not a major issue. It's a wonderful looking umbrella, the powder coating upon opening is most likely so the plastic doesn't stick together during storage/shipping and was very easy to clean off. Comes with a lifetime warranty, will update if I ever need to use it & why.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I Wish It Would Rain
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella from Totes, and especially the iridescent appeal, along with a lifetime warranty. The umbrella opened easily, there was no powder substance in between the plastic folds (as described in similar type umbrella reviews). The fact that there is a lifetime warranty allowed me to pay more for it than I might have paid through another company, knowing that Totes backs their product. Now I just have to wait until it rains and the wind blows to finish my review. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Umbrella is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: While on vacation in London, I learned about all the umbrellas that Queen Elizabeth uses (random, I know). Apparently she uses an umbrella similar to this one so the fans can always see her face, plus it keeps her hair perfectly shaped. Upon returning, I had to try one out for myself -- the Queen's got the right idea! This umbrella keeps me much drier than a standard, wide umbrella, and I love that it fully covers my face and long hair. It opens and collapses pretty seamlessly, and the material is sturdy. It is a little on the larger side, so not totally convenient for commuting. But I'm not sure how a bubble umbrella could condense any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney K

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: First of all, THIS UMBRELLA IS MEAN FOR WOMEN. My wife loves it. I bought it for my wife who really hate umbrella flip or broke under high wind. This umbrella is perfect for her. It's a perect size that fit into her work locker. Then I used it today for 5 mins under light rain. From my arm and up, it stays dry. Anything under was wet. I'm 5'7" 180lbs size med to large. It definitely not for men.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: totes Signature Clear Bubble Umbrella
product_meta.description: Color:ClearGet a clear view on the world with the Classic Clear Bubble Umbrella by Totes. This super clear PVC umbrella has a canopy arc of 52 inches open with a generous 17 inches of headroom providing extra rain protection while allowing you to see clearly. Designed with a classic J shaped handle it is easy to carry. The timeless look of this classic style makes this umbrella the perfect gift. You will be able to face any weather and still stay looking great. Please note that when you first open your umbrella you will see a fine powdery film coating the interior of the umbrellas canopy. This has been done intentionally by the manufacturer in order to maintain the integrity of the canopy while the umbrella is being stored in the warehouse. To remove the film simply wipe off the interior with a dry rag and enjoy.
feature_bullets: CLEAR STYLISH BUBBLE UMBRELLA: Waterproof clear canopy for maximum rain coverage and see through visibility
WINDPROOF AND RAINPROOF: With 51” canopy, you’ll be protected from the wind and the rain so hair and clothes stay dry
LIGHTWEIGHT CONSTRUCTION: Aluminum shaft offers a lightweight design with comfortable acrylic matte silver finish handle
EASY AND DURABLE. Care instructions: Leave open to dry. Wipe clean with a damp cloth

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,644 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
